What is Lorem Ipsum? Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typese
tting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever sin
ce the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to
make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the
 leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popul
arised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum p
assages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker
 including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fac
t that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when lookin
g at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less no
rmal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here',
making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web p
age editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'l
orem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions
 have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injec
ted humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lor
em Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin l
iterature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin
 professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obsc
ure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the
cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lo
rem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malo
rum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a
 treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The firs
t line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in sect
ion 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced
 below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonor
um et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accom
panied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I g
et some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the
majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomise
d words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a pas
sage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidde
n in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to
repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on t
he Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handf
ul of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable.
 The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected hu
mour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply

evable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure th
ere isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsu

ays free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What

s reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition
, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ips
um is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum ha
s been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown
printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It
has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesett
ing, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the r
elease of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently wit
h desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem I
psum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distra
cted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of
using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters,
as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable E
nglish. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsu
m as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many
web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years,
sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where
 does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random
text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making i
t over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney C
ollege in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur,
from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical
 literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections
1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and
 Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of eth
ics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem
ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk
 of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. S
ections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are a
lso reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions fro
m the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variati
ons of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alterat
ion in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even
slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need
to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All t
he Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as ne
cessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a diction
ary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structure
s, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is
therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic wo
rds etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and

ses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sente
nce structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lo
rem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-char
acteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the
 printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard
 dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type
and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five cen
turies, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unc
hanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets cont
aining Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software
like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a
long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content o
f a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it h
as a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content h
ere, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishin
g packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text,
 and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infan
cy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometim
es on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to
 popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece
of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard
 McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up
one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, an
d going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the un
doubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Fin
ibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 4
5 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the R
enaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes
 from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the
 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 fr
om "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact
original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. R
ackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum

humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you ar
e going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anythin
g embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on t
he Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first

le. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there
isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum ge
nerators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making t
his the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 L
atin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lo
rem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always
free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is L
orem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting indu
stry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 150
0s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a typ
e specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into
 electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in
the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, a
nd more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including
 versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a r
eader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its l
ayout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distr
ibution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it
look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editor
s now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum
' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evol
ved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour
 and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum i
s not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature
from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor
 at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin
words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of t
he word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum
comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The
Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise
on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of
Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.3
2.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for
 those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malo
rum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by
English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?Th
ere are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority h
ave suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words wh
ich don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lo

companied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can
I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but t
he majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or random

passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hi
dden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend
to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator o
n the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a ha
ndful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonab
le. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected
 humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simp
ly dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the
 industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer to
ok a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has surviv
ed not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remai
ning essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of
Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop
publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why d
o we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by th
e readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lore
m Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed
 to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Ma
ny desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their
 default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites
still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes
by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it c
ome from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It h
as roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 200
0 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in
Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lor
em Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literatur
e, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 an
d 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by
Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very
popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolo
r sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem
Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.

and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy tex
t ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scramb
led it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, bu
t also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It
 was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lor
em Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus
 PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long estab
lished fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page w
hen looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-
or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, conte
nt here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages
 and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a sea
rch for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Variou
s versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purp
ose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular b
elief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classic
al Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintoc
k, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the

rough the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable
source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonor

Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written i
n 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during th
e Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", co
mes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since
the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33

ct original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H
. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ip
sum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by inject
ed humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you

hing embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators o
n the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the fi
rst true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words
, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum
which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from
repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum
?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lore
m Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when a
n unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen
 book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electroni
c typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s
with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more re
cently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions
of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will
 be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The
 point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of
 letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like
readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use
Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will unc
over many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over t
he years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the l
ike).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simp
ly random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC
, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampde
n-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, con
sectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in

re from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin profes
sor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Lat
in words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites o
f the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ips
um comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (T
he Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treati
se on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line
of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.1
0.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below
for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et M
alorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied
by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some
?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majorit
y have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words

 Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in th
e middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat
predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Inte
rnet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of m
odel sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The ge
nerated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, o
r non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy t
ext of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry'
s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galle
y of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not onl
y five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essen
tially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset s
heets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing
 software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use i
t?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable
 content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is
 that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using
'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop
 publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default m
odel text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in t
heir infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by acciden
t, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?C
ontrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots i

es by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does i
t come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. I
t has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over
2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College
in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a
Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical litera
ture, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32
 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil)
by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, ve
ry popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum d
olor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lor
em Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections
 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also rep
roduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1
914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of
passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in
some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightl
y believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be s
ure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lore
m Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary
, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of
over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to g
enerate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefo
re always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc
.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typese
tting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever sin
ce the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to
make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the
 leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popul
arised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum p
assages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker
 including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fac
t that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when lookin
g at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less no
rmal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here',
making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web p
age editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'l
orem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions

ted humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lor

ntent here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packa
ges and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a
search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Var
ious versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on p
urpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popula
r belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of clas
sical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClin
tock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of
the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going
 through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtab
le source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bo
norum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. T
his book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissa
nce. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a
 line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s
is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de
Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact origina
l form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.
Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum availa
ble, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour,
 or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going
 to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embar
rassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Inte
rnet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true g
enerator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined
 with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which look
s reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition
, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ips
um is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum ha
s been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown
printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It
has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesett
ing, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the r
elease of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently wit
h desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem I
psum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distra
cted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of
using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters,
as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable E
nglish. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsu
m as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many
web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years,
sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where

ill be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution
 of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look li
ke readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now u
se Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will
uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved ove
r the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and th
e like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not s
imply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45
 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Ham
pden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words,
consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word
 in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes f
rom sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extreme
s of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the
theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem I
psum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The s
tandard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those
interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by
 Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English
 versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are
 many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suf
fered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don
't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ips
um, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle o
f text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined
 chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It u
ses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sente
nce structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lo
rem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-char
acteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the

t sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publish
ing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we us
e it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the reada
ble content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum
 is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to usi
ng 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desk
top publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their defaul
t model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still i
n their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by acci
dent, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come fro
m?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has root
s in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years
 old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virgini
a, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsu
m passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, disc
overed the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.
33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero,
 written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular
 during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit a
met..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum u
sed since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 a
nd 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in
 their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 transl
ation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages o
f Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form,
 by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believab
le. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there
isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum ge
nerators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making t
his the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 L
atin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lo
rem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always
free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is L

stry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 150

since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it
to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also
the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was po
pularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsu
m passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMa
ker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established
fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when loo
king at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less
 normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here
', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and we
b page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for
 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versi
ons have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (in
jected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief,
Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Lati
n literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a La
tin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more o
bscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through t
he cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.
 Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et M
alorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book i
s a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The f
irst line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in s
ection 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reprodu
ced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bo
norum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, ac
companied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can
I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but t
he majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or random
ised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a
passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hi
dden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend
to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator o
n the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a ha
ndful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonab
le. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected
 humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simp

rature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin pr
ofessor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure

ently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions o
f Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will
be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The
point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of
letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like r
eadable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use L
orem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will unco
ver many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over th
e years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the li
ke).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simpl
y random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC,
 making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden
-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, cons
ectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in
classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from

ry of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum

ion, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem
Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum
 has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unkno
wn printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic types
etting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with th
e release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently
with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lore
m Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be dis
tracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point
of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letter
s, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readabl
e English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem I
psum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover ma
ny web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the year
s, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Wh
ere does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply rand
om text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, makin
g it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydne
y College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetu
r, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classi
cal literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sectio
ns 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good
and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of
ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lor
em ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard ch
unk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested
. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero ar
e also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions
from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many vari
ations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alte
ration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look ev
en slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you ne
ed to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. Al
l the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as
 necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dict
ionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence struct
ures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum
is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic

t uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model se
ntence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated
 Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-c
haracteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of
the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's stand
ard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of ty
pe and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five
centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially
unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets c
ontaining Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing softwa
re like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is
 a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable conten
t of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that i
t has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Conten
t here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publis
hing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model te
xt, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their in
fancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, some
times on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary
 to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a pie
ce of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Rich
ard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked
up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage,
 and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the
 undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de
Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written i
n 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during th
e Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", co
mes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since
the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33
 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exa
ct original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H
. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ip
sum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by inject
ed humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you
 are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anyt
hing embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators o
n the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the fi
rst true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words

repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum

rem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions

ed humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lore

terature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin

s of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some fo
rm, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly belie
vable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure the
re isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum

g this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 20
0 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate
 Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore alwa
ys free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What i
s Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting i
ndustry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the
1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a
type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap i
nto electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised
in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages
, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker includ
ing versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that
a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at it
s layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal di
stribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making
it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page edi
tors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ip
sum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have e
volved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected hum
our and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsu
m is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literatu
re from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin profes
sor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Lat
in words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites o
f the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ips
um comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (T
he Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treati
se on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line
of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.1
0.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below
for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et M
alorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied
by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some

r on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a

nable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injec
ted humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is s
imply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been
the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer
 took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has sur
vived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, re
maining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release
of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with deskt
op publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Wh
y do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by
 the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using L
orem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as oppo
sed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
 Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as th
eir default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sit
es still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometim
es by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).Where does i
t come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. I
t has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over
2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College
in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a
Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical litera
ture, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32
 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil)
by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, ve
ry popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum d

od and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory
of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard
 chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interes
ted. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero
 are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versio
ns from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many v
ariations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered a
lteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look
 even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you
 need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.
 All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks
 as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a d
ictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence str
uctures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ips
um is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteris
tic words etc.What is Lorem Ipsum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printi
ng and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scr
ambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries,
 but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.
 It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing
Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Al
dus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long es
tablished fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a pag
e when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a mo
re-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, co
ntent here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packa
ges and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a
search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Var
ious versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on p
urpose (injected humour and the like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popula
r belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of clas
sical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClin
tock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of
the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going
 through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtab
le source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bo
norum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. T
his book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissa
nce. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a

ge, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered
the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "
de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, writte
n in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during
 the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..",
 comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used sin
ce the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10
.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their
exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation b
y H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are many variations of passages of Lorem
 Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by inj
ected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If
you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't a
nything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generator
s on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the
 first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin wo
rds, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ips
um which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free fr
om repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.What is Lorem Ip
sum?Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. L
orem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, whe
n an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type speci
men book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electr
onic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 196
0s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more
 recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versio
ns of Lorem Ipsum.Why do we use it?It is a long established fact that a reader w
ill be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution
 of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look li
ke readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now u
se Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will
uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved ove
r the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and th
e like).Where does it come from?Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not s
imply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45
 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Ham
pden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words,
consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word
 in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes f
rom sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extreme
s of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the
theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem I
psum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.The s
tandard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those
interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by
 Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English
 versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.Where can I get some?There are
 many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suf
fered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don
't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ips
um, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle o
f text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined

ses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sente
nce structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lo
rem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-char
acteristic words etc.
